""Hello,We need a NATIVE Czech translator join our team and work with us in future projects. (English to Czech).Please it's very important that you are native and that you are from Czech Republic.First project would be about 250 words and it will help us to check your quality. However if your quality is high, we will have much more work to be done.The type of content is not technical, but our projects are mainly related with financial content, gambling content and some of the adult content, so translator should do the necessary research for terminology. Our Czech reviewer can also help with questions you may have.IMPORTANT:Please let us know your rate per word, in usd/word, keeping in mind that this is for ongoing work and much work will come if you do high quality translations. I have been living as a digital nomad and working in this field for the past few years and I now want to scale things up.As part of growing my business, I’d like to find reliable editors to work with. I want to grow in the industry and undertake more/bigger projects.Disclaimer: this isn’t going to be full time to begin with. In the long run I would love to be able to hire you, but at the moment I just need one or two freelancers to delegate work to.What I want from you:- Experience: I need you to have a track record in video editing and to be able to showcase previous projects. Preferably you work on the Adobe Suite, but if you use other softwares, we can always make do. You don’t need to work for Hollywood but I still need solid skills.- Flexibility: as I’m sure you know, some clients are harder to deal with or have very short deadlines. I would like someone who is ready to work on short notice and review their work if necessary.- Creativity: I would like someone who will find the little extra touch to stand out. UGC is everywhere and it is more important than ever to come up with new ideas to secure the most interesting partnerships.- Versatility: we will create for many different clients, so you will need to be able to adapt to any type of project, whether it is regarding the format or the topic. Usually it will be shorts etc., so feel free to show more of your fast-paces motion design videos.- Patience: I reiterate that this won’t be a straight line to a big salary, and some periods might be very empty. As a growing business we may have to accept unfavorable terms from time to time; so expect pretty variable pays throughout the year.What you get from me:- Interesting (not all the time) projects that you don’t need to look for yourself.- Someone available and comprehensive to work with. I have experience in this field and I know the struggles that can come with it. I will be there to discuss and assist in any way I can.- Most of the pay you will generate: I would obviously take a cut off of projects you would undertake as a remuneration for running the logistics of the business, but I aim to make it as fair as possible to you.- Possibility to grow: once again you won’t make millions to begin with, but as our revenues increase, I hope to reward you as best as I can. Also, if our partnership is fruitful, there is a possibility for you to obtain a better position as one of the first members. Maybe managing a team yourself or something like this, we’ll see in due time.Little pluses:- Language proficiency: I personally speak English, French and Spanish. You obviously must be fluent in English, but it’d be great if you master other languages so we can comfortably approach other clients.- You live in Europe or SEA: I’m from Europe and will be living part time in SEA in the foreseeable future. It would be great to have the possibility to meet if we plan on working together long term.- You have other skills: I mainly need video editors as this is the most profitable niche, but I also undertake projects including Voice Over, Graphic Design and Web Design. It will be very handy if you can do any of these as well.Also remember that the criteria above are more of a wishlist rather than mandatory criteria; feel free to reach out even if you don’t tick all the boxes :)Please send me your resume/portfolio/links to your best work, and start your application with “YOU NEED ME BECAUSE..” + the reason why you want to onboard the project, so I know you read my (way too) long offer.
